name: HAYDEN PEDIGO - SEVEN YEARS LATE CS30
description: MAR006 HAYDEN PEDIGO SEVEN YEARS LATE CS30 RELEASE DATE: APRIL 12TH, 2013 EDITION OF 50 WHITE SHELLED, CHROME+ EXTRA C30 CASSETTE TAPES WITH BLACK IMPRINTED INK 2 PANEL, 2 SIDED J-CARD PRINTED ON 25LB, IVORY & COTTON LINEN PAPER, HAND NUMBERED INCLUDES A DIGITAL DOWNLOAD OF THE ALBUM & A LIMITED 1.5" BLACK & WHITE BUTTON SIDE A: 1. BUILDING THE CHURCH OF THE LOST 2. THE DREAM LISTEN 3. I THINK I WANT THE LIGHT 4. DREAMING OF NOTHING 5. SEVEN YEARS LATE SIDE B: 1. SKY IS GROWING 2. MARS CURIOSITY LISTEN 3. SMALL WORLD 4. CHOICES THAT I'VE MADE 5. I WON'T GO ANY FURTHER 6. *RAGA FOR WILD EYES (FEATURING KYLE FOSBURGH) *BONUS TRACK WITH DIGITAL DOWNLOAD OF ALBUM INSERT ARTWORK: DANIEL BACHMAN MADE IN CANADA SELECTED REVIEWS FOR SEVEN YEARS LATE: "This is simply personal music that is well performed and says what it has to say." - The Mine of American Music "Very dreamy atmospheres and a nice listen in the early morning, to swing into the day." - Dying for Bad Music "Playing out with a light jazz inflection, "Seven Years Late" feels the space between each & every note with bated breath, letting harmonics ring out into the ether." - Gloomfolk

name: BRENDAN CODEY - TWIN CHIMNEY CS20
description: MAR005 BRENDAN CODEY TWIN CHIMNEY CS20 RELEASE DATE: MARCH 8TH 2013 EDITION OF 75 SPLIT, BLACK & WHITE SHELLED, CHROME+ EXTRA C20 CASSETTE TAPES WITH WHITE & BLACK IMPRINTED INK 2 PANELED ONE SIDED J-CARD INCLUDES A LIMITED 1" BLACK & WHITE BUTTON SIDE A: 1. THE HEAD THROB HEART LIKE (5:57) 2. TWIN CHIMNEY (3:35) LISTEN SIDE B: 1. A WELL MADE BOX (PARTS 1&2) (8:58) MADE IN CANADA SELECTED REVIEWS FOR BRENDAN CODEY: "...with a brief set of strange Americana with an eccentric, almost Mark Linkous-esque twist and multi-faceted sonic palette that belied the rather typical soundscapes of his recorded work." - Under the Radar "...Codey’s considerable songwriting talents are made clear. Casco as a whole is rough, but often beautiful. The sort of cassette you might find at a Salvation Army in a small California town and be pleasantly surprised by." - The Fader "He paints himself as a Beat-era vagabond who consists solely on and for music. His dystopian, calm reserve often dissolves into a meditative hailstorm, placing the listener right in the eye of the storm looking out." - The Deli Magazine (Philadelphia)

name: HAUNTED HOUSES - SELF TITLE CS42
description: MAR004 HAUNTED HOUSES SELF TITLE CS42 RELEASE DATE: FEBRUARY 13TH, 2013 EDITION OF 100 BROWN COLORED SHELLED, CHROME+ EXTRA C42 CASSETTE TAPES WITH WHITE IMPRINTED INK FULL COLORED, 2 PANELED DOUBLE SIDED J-CARD INCLUDES A LIMITED 2.25" FULL COLORED BUTTON SIDE A: 1. BEYOND RIGHT & WRONG, WE FIND LOVE, WE FIND TRUTH (3:27) LISTEN 2. DRAGGER (2:41) 3. DIVE INTO REALITY (5:40) 4. SATIETY (6:40) SIDE B: 1. W AND A (ONE TAKE, IMPROVISATION) FEAT. BRYAN SHAO (2:30) LISTEN 2. HIGH IN NEW WORLD (3:21) 3. GHOST SYMPHONY 01 (5:18) VIDEO 4. FIRE WATER (5:03) 5. DEMO OF ANTHEM 109 (EXTRA TRACK) FEAT. BRIAN SHIN (6:09) MADE IN CANADA SELECTED REVIEWS FOR HAUNTED HOUSES: "...distended mystical folk songs, battered tremelo guitar in the back corner of a room, slow-stomp swamp drums, and that signature soulful yelp of LoPilato that is reminiscent of early Isaac Brock." - No Kings Record Co. "The dark lyrical themes and blown out guitar drones give off some uneasy vibes, which only made me like it more..." - Cassette Gods "LoPilato tackles heady topics such as the “inner realms” of consciousness and how “the power of the beyond is within ourselves.” - Boy Attractions

name: JEZZEBEAM "SELF TITLED" CS28
description:
MAR003 JEZZEBEAM SELF TITLED CS28 RELEASE DATE: DECEMBER 13TH, 2012 EDITION OF 100 IVORY SHELLED, CHROME+ EXTRA C26 CASSETTE TAPES WITH BLACK IMPRINTED INK FULL COLORED, DOUBLE SIDED, 2 PANELED TEXTURED J-CARD INCLUDES A LIMITED 1" FULL COLORED BUTTON SIDE A: 1. TRIMMED SHADOWS (4:56) 2. OMNI-COLOURED (3:32) 3. SUN IS MOURNING (2:41) 4. THEME FOR A WANDERING NOBODY (2:17) SIDE B: 1. PAST KILLS (4:21) 2. Y SLEEP (3:44) 3. WARM REIGN (4:57) MADE IN CANADA SELECTED REVIEWS FOR JEZZEBEAM: "Cockrell appears to be reaching out for something experimental from his own perspective, and that simple pursuit has gently landed him amongst these hazily lulling atmospheric qualities that often lend themselves to the compositions to create uniquely quaquaversal sound structures." - Sage Weatherford, HeathenHarvest.org

"Jezzebeam drifts into the mix with an almost-spoken voice detailing the depths we've come to and the ones we've yet to learn of."
- Gloomfolk

name: MIKE BRUNO + THE BLACK MAGIC FAMILY BAND "IN THE SHADE" 7"
description: MAR001 MIKE BRUNO + THE BLACK MAGIC FAMILY BAND "IN THE SHADE" 7" RELEASE DATE: FEBRUARY 13TH, 2012 EDITION OF 250 100 CLEAR VINYL OOP 150 BLACK VINYL SCREEN PRINTED PANELS SIDE A: 1. IN THE SHADE (3:38) 2. WHITE WANDS FOR MORGAN (2:06) SIDE B: 1.THE WOODS OF NO REGRET (5:22) SELECTED REVIEWS FOR IN THE SHADE: "I'm not one for black magic. However, if black magic happens to be like this, I might have to think about dabbling with the dark side." - Jimmy Morris, HeadUnderwater.com "Three creeped-out and broody tracks place you somewhere between a weird wood and sullen English moor looking for a hit of acid and/or a cup of tea." - Bradley Kerl, BradleyKerl.com "Found a positive thing about New Jersey; Mike Bruno." - Shlomo Sonnenfeld, LoFiles.org

artists.name: Mike Bruno + the Black Magic Family Band
